byline.original: By STUART ELLIOTT and TANZINA VEGA

snippet: Apple pioneered the big budget Super Bowl ad on TV, just one of the marketing advances led by Steven P. Jobs, executives at Advertising Week 2011 said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Apple pioneered the big budget Super Bowl ad on TV, just one of the marketing advances led by Steven P. Jobs, executives at Advertising Week 2011 said Thursday.

headline.main: Apple Innovations Include Start of Big-Budget Super Bowl Ads
headline.print_headline: Apple Innovations Include Start Of Big-Budget Super Bowl Ads
headline.seo: Recalling Apple’s Influence and Innovations - Advertising
